text: <@UD53A9UUR> thanks, as I see, that is not possible to have a campaign domain, that’s strange

Has anyone implemented bootstrap 4 into their own templates?  Any resources you can point me to?

I’m sure I could figure it out but always could use advice and I’m still new to the HubSpot CMS.

Yes several of us have but our implementations are very custom to the projects we’re building, there’s a community effort to move toward implementing some of bootstrap 4's core features like the grid, into a HubSpot specific framework <#CCQSQ2C6L|crankshaft> it’s still very much in the early days but if you’d like to contribute towards it or would like to get updates on it joining that channel would be a good idea
What the most optimum way you’ve found to use SVGs in HubSpot?
